author: Josh Boak
title: Biden to call for 3-month suspension of gas and diesel taxes - The Associated Press
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden on Wednesday will call on Congress to suspend federal gasoline and diesel taxes for three months — a move meant to ease financial pressures at the pump that also reveals the political toxicity of high gas prices  in an el…
